revised_title: Observations on the Glands in the Human Spleen and Fractures in the Thigh-Bone
tldr: The authors present two medical observations: one on the glands in the human spleen and another on a fracture in the upper part of the thigh-bone. They discuss the anatomy and structure of the spleen glands and the distinction between a fracture and luxation of the thigh-bone, providing valuable insights for the fields of anatomy, surgery, and medicine.
